content: the romi hot water bottle cover is the perfect project for a knitter wanting to make something quick and fun knitted from the bottom up and in the round using soft boucle yarn it will become a favorite accessory when curling up on the sofa the romi hot water bottle cover fits fit a standard 2 liter hot water bottle yardage 153 yards / 140 meters suggested yarn alpaca boucle by drops aran weight 80% alpaca 15% wool 5% manufactured fibers 50g 153 yards/ 140 meters 1 skein required
